column4: XiXaq: I've done it a couple of times... what are you running into?
failed dependency:  /bin/sh is needed by VMware-server-1.0.1-29996.i386
jb0nd38372, I've been trying to install the rpm version.
the RPM worked great on RHEL for me... however, from my limited experience, rpm's don't install on debian or ubuntu.. you'll probably have to install it via a .deb... by converting it through alien.
